name_original: Trust Me (Silvienblade, Zama Dhlamini, FieryDashes, EHudJdg3:15-28, TiredTirade, Bradley Williams)
description:
Description:

Free an imprisoned ally by completing puzzles, but remember a lot is not what it seems, use your ability to create and push decoy's to complete puzzles and free the imprisoned ally.

Use the Physic's basics of the Character Controller in order to complete puzzles.

Learn about not trusting people you've just met.

Categories:

Mobile - Easy to port to mobile, low poly assets.

Physics - Using Physics with Decoys and puzzle solving.

Technical - Custom Character Controller, allows for us to customize everything from gravity, jump force, also allows the player to move on moving objects.

Aesthetic - Models sourced, Custom Shaders, VFX and UI Applied.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

E - Spawn Decoy

Left Click - Punch

Tab - Switch First Person/Third Person
